name: Jack

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: So you're the outsider. Lived your whole life out there, huh? Wow.

topics.topic_text: So tell me about this girl that caught your interest.
topics.response_text: There's an outpost near here. The signs say "Crimson Caravan?" It seems like they carry things to and fro for people out there?

topics.topic_text: I've got scrap metal for you.
topics.response_text: Cool! How much can you spare?

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for ways to help out. Anything come to mind?
topics.response_text: What I could use is some scrap metal. It may not sound exciting, but around here we have to recycle every rivet and plate.

topics.topic_text: What do you do here?
topics.response_text: Me? I work with Loyal, mostly electronics work and robotics. Keeping the old technologies alive, right?

topics.topic_text: I can find you some scrap metal.
topics.response_text: Thanks. That'd be great.

topics.topic_text: Personal matter? Nonsense. Spit it out.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I'll keep my spit to myself, thank you very much. That sounded stupid, didn't it? Damn it.

topics.topic_text: Good news. She feels the same way.
topics.response_text: She does? You mean it? That's incredible!

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: All right. See you around, I hope.

topics.topic_text: This doesn't interest me.
topics.response_text: Then why did you make me spill my guts about it? You're an asshole!

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Loyal?
topics.response_text: Loyal's a great man, but he's getting on in years, so a younger's got to learn everything he knows. That'd be me.

topics.topic_text: I can spare 2.
topics.response_text: Thanks.

topics.topic_text: Maybe I could talk to her for you. What's she look like?
topics.response_text: Oh, you can't miss her! She has short red hair and she's the most beautiful woman who ever lived!

topics.topic_text: I'll look into it. Stranger things have happened.
topics.response_text: That would be amazing. As in, I would thank you forever.

topics.topic_text: Just 1.
topics.response_text: Thanks.

topics.topic_text: Just take all of it.
topics.response_text: Hey thanks!

topics.topic_text: Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but I think she's dead.
topics.response_text: What?! No! I mean, I haven't seen her around for a while, but I thought she was just busy working.

topics.topic_text: Loyal said you can help me breathe under water.
topics.response_text: I just need some parts from a pressure cooker to create a hermetic seal for the rebreather.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else
topics.response_text: Okay.

topics.topic_text: That's all for now.
topics.response_text: Thanks for dropping it off. Anything else?

topics.topic_text: A "personal matter," eh? Handsome guy like you, I bet there's a girl involved.
topics.response_text: You think I'm handsome? Wow, I wonder if she does, too!

topics.topic_text: Recover a Lady? What are you talking about?
topics.response_text: Did I say that? Sometimes I just say stupid things! Sorry about that.

topics.topic_text: I can wait until Pearl or Loyal want to tell me.
topics.response_text: Thanks. Sometimes I talk too much. I guess you already know that.

topics.topic_text: I've had other things to attend to.
topics.response_text: You said you'd talk to her. Don't treat me like a jerk for asking.

topics.topic_text: I've seen her, but we haven't talked about you yet.
topics.response_text: Well, please, talk to her soon. The suspense is killing me!

topics.topic_text: I spoke to Pearl, but Janet needs a way past the artillery.
topics.response_text: Here take this Boomer outfit. I'll let the gunners know she is coming, and not to shoot at her.

topics.topic_text: I told her how to get through the artillery barrage.
topics.response_text: Wow, that seems dangerous, but if you really think it's safe, I'll trust you. You did make it here, afterall.

topics.topic_text: It's not my fault that your tribe blows up everyone who comes close.
topics.response_text: I wish we'd blown you up! I wish you were dead! Just leave me alone!

topics.topic_text: <Lie> It's a tragedy. She loved you so much, she risked it all.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, my sweet blameless Red! Curse the walls of Nellis! Curse our guns and isolation! Her blood is on our hands!

topics.topic_text: <Lie> She was so excited to see you, she wouldn't wait.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Then why didn't you stop her? You could've tackled her or something! You knew how much she meant to me!

topics.topic_text: Not yet.
topics.response_text: Okay, well let me know when you do.

topics.topic_text: I have one right here.
topics.response_text: Thanks, this will just take a few moments...

topics.topic_text: I can spare 4.
topics.response_text: Thanks.

topics.topic_text: Corn silk, rubber hose, and removable adhesive would make a good hermetic seal.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] That's a brilliant idea! I can put that together right now...

topics.topic_text: Actually. I can't spare anything right now.
topics.response_text: That's too bad. I was hoping to melt some more down for machining.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Bye.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll let you know if I find a pressure cooker.
topics.response_text: Great, that's all I need to get the rebreather to work right. I don't think you'd want to start breathing water halfway down.

topics.topic_text: A "personal matter," hmm? Handsome guy like you, I bet there's a girl involved.
topics.response_text: You think I'm handsome? Wow, I wonder if she does, too!

topics.topic_text: I'd like to hear about that personal matter you mentioned.
topics.response_text: I thought you weren't interested.

conversation.response_text: Hello, it is great to finally meet you.
I'm glad that you made it out here. You're even more stunning up close than you were at a distance.
Of course it would. I'll have you set up with some quarters with some of the other women.

description:
Jack is a 19 year-old Caucasian Male.

Jack is a young Boomer living at Nellis Air Force Base, working as an apprentice mechanic in the Nellis hangars. With a fascination for pre-War technology and a knack for fixing what others consider scrap, Jack spends most of his days assisting the aging mechanic Loyal. Despite his sheltered life at the base, Jack has developed a romantic interest in Janet, a Crimson Caravan Company employee he occasionally sees from afar.

Jack's Personality: Curious, hardworking, and somewhat naive about the outside world. Jack shows dedication to his mechanical work but can be shy when interacting with outsiders. He harbors a secret crush on Janet and often daydreams about life beyond the base walls.

Jack's Backstory: Born and raised at Nellis Air Force Base among the Boomers, Jack has never ventured far from the safety of the community. From a young age, he showed an interest in the pre-War aircraft and machinery stored in the hangars. When he came of age, he was taken on as an apprentice by Loyal, the base's chief mechanic. Under Loyal's guidance, Jack has become skilled at repairing and maintaining the various mechanical contraptions found in the wasteland, though he still has much to learn about the world outside the base.
